reviewText: If you believe in a creator, this film is will be appreciated for its accuracy toward the evidence of such. If you believe in evolution, this film will challenge the things you have been taught. Either way Brad Harrub does an excellent job presenting the evidence that so often times in todays textbooks and television shows refuse to reveal or acknowledge. The evidence is out there, and the facts are real, reguardless of what man chooses to believe.

From the title, I expected an historical account of Darwin's travels in the Galapagos including an objective scientific review of his theory of evolution.  This film is none of this.  Instead it presents an anti evolution ideology.

This documentary is great.  It exposes many things about the faulty theory of Darwinism, but also shows us Darwin from an angle that few of us have seen him.  Thank you Dr. Harrub for being so courageous in your studies and in your presentation.
